data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Ramgarh to agree with you and with one another.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ramgarh, Jharkhand, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Ramgarh.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Ramgarh, Jharkhand, India that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Ramgarh, Jharkhand, India a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Khadura people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Khadura people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Khadura people is yours.
Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the county of Ramgarh. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 1,458 believers in Ramgarh, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.section_summary:
the county of Ramgarh, Jharkhand, India has a population of 132,500.

We estimate Ramgarh has 1,458 people who might know Jesus, 1,608 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 129,435 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Ramgarh, Jharkhand, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.
